meanings.definition: The activity or skill of making items from wood.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning about woodworkings in my carpentry class.
meanings.sent2: The shelves in the living room are beautiful woodworkings.
meanings.sent3: The woodworkings in the workshop seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to woodworkings was as solid as oak.
meanings.sent5: The intricate woodworkings of the chair were a testament to the craftsman's talent.

meanings.sent1: The artisan displayed various woodworkings at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: The cabin was filled with unique woodworkings crafted by the owner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the woodworkings for real trees.
meanings.sent4: The woodworkings in the room whispered stories of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The antique shop showcased a collection of exquisite woodworkings.
